mydoliboardsheet.querydisp: SELECT COUNT( IF( MONTH( tms ) =1, rowid, NULL ) ) AS janv, COUNT( IF( MONTH( tms ) =2, rowid, NULL ) ) AS fevr, COUNT( IF( MONTH( tms ) =3, rowid, NULL ) ) AS mars, COUNT( IF( MONTH( tms ) =4, rowid, NULL ) ) AS avril, COUNT( IF( MONTH( tms ) =5, rowid, NULL ) ) AS mai, COUNT( IF( MONTH( tms ) =6, rowid, NULL ) ) AS juin, COUNT( IF( MONTH( tms ) =7, rowid, NULL ) ) AS juill, COUNT( IF( MONTH( tms ) =8, rowid, NULL ) ) AS aout, COUNT( IF( MONTH( tms ) =9, rowid, NULL ) ) AS sept, COUNT( IF( MONTH( tms ) =10, rowid, NULL ) ) AS oct, COUNT( IF( MONTH( tms ) =11, rowid, NULL ) ) AS nov, COUNT( IF( MONTH( tms ) =12, rowid, NULL ) ) AS dece FROM llx_product where year(tms)=#ANNEE#

mydoliboardsheet.author: patas-monkeys.com
mydoliboardsheet.querydisp: SELECT COUNT( IF( MONTH( f.tms ) =1, fd.rowid, NULL ) ) AS janv, COUNT( IF( MONTH( f.tms ) =2, fd.rowid, NULL ) ) AS fevr, COUNT( IF( MONTH( f.tms ) =3, fd.rowid, NULL ) ) AS mars, COUNT( IF( MONTH( f.tms ) =4, fd.rowid, NULL ) ) AS avril, COUNT( IF( MONTH( f.tms ) =5, fd.rowid, NULL ) ) AS mai, COUNT( IF( MONTH( f.tms ) =6, fd.rowid, NULL ) ) AS juin, COUNT( IF( MONTH( f.tms ) =7, fd.rowid, NULL ) ) AS juill, COUNT( IF( MONTH( f.tms ) =8, fd.rowid, NULL ) ) AS aout, COUNT( IF( MONTH( f.tms ) =9, fd.rowid, NULL ) ) AS sept, COUNT( IF( MONTH( f.tms ) =10, fd.rowid, NULL ) ) AS oct, COUNT( IF( MONTH( f.tms ) =11, fd.rowid, NULL ) ) AS nov, COUNT( IF( MONTH( f.tms ) =12, fd.rowid, NULL ) ) AS dece FROM llx_facturedet AS fd, llx_facture AS f WHERE product_type =0 AND fd.fk_facture = f.rowid and year(tms)=#ANNEE#

mydoliboardsheet.author: patas-monkeys.com
mydoliboardsheet.querydisp: SELECT COUNT( IF( MONTH( f.tms ) =1, fd.rowid, NULL ) ) AS janv, COUNT( IF( MONTH( f.tms ) =2, fd.rowid, NULL ) ) AS fevr, COUNT( IF( MONTH( f.tms ) =3, fd.rowid, NULL ) ) AS mars, COUNT( IF( MONTH( f.tms ) =4, fd.rowid, NULL ) ) AS avril, COUNT( IF( MONTH( f.tms ) =5, fd.rowid, NULL ) ) AS mai, COUNT( IF( MONTH( f.tms ) =6, fd.rowid, NULL ) ) AS juin, COUNT( IF( MONTH( f.tms ) =7, fd.rowid, NULL ) ) AS juill, COUNT( IF( MONTH( f.tms ) =8, fd.rowid, NULL ) ) AS aout, COUNT( IF( MONTH( f.tms ) =9, fd.rowid, NULL ) ) AS sept, COUNT( IF( MONTH( f.tms ) =10, fd.rowid, NULL ) ) AS oct, COUNT( IF( MONTH( f.tms ) =11, fd.rowid, NULL ) ) AS nov, COUNT( IF( MONTH( f.tms ) =12, fd.rowid, NULL ) ) AS dece FROM llx_facture_fourn_det AS fd, llx_facture_fourn AS f WHERE product_type =0 AND fd.fk_facture_fourn = f.rowid and year(tms)=#ANNEE#
